item.description:
This Super Bowl Party Option is for those who live in the suburbs north of Boston and can not make it into our primary party in Boston.

The Patriots are out but many of us are still looking forward to a good super Bowl between the Baltimore Ravens and the San Francisco Forty Niners!

The Red Sox Natives will be teaming with Wakefield Week Nights and other suburban groups for this event.

This is a private party as Laurie's will be closed to the public. You must have a reservation. The party includes:

1. Pick your guaranteed seat at the Penny LaneBar, Raw Bar or at a Table

2. Pasta and Raw Bar

3. Carving Station

4. Rotating Appetizers

5. Half Time Raffle Prizes

6. Watch on 4 Big Screen HDTVs

7. $3.00 per Draft Beer all game

8. $5.00 Super Bowl Punch

TO RESERVE: Call Bob or Laurie at Laurie's to make the credit card reservation and pick your reserved seat. All food and reserved pick seat is included in the $40.00 price. Call 781-246-1909 or 781-223-7169. Your RSVP on the Natives Meetup means nothing until you call and reserve with Laurie's.

Space is limited. Reserve early and pick the best seats.

For more information on Laurie's 909 please go to www.lauries909.com.

Arrive any time after 5:00pm to claim your reserved pre-paid seat and enjoy some pre-game socializing.

Game time is 6:30pm. 

If this will be your first time meeting the Red Sox Natives and Happy Hour Crew, check out the photos of those who RSVP Yes so you can find the group. 

Please remember to maintain your own tab or pay as you order and tip your servers. However, if you sit at a group table a group bill may be provided so please communicate with your server when ordering.

Paricipating Groups are:

1. Wakefield Week Nights

2. Boston Happy Hour

3. Red Sox Natives

4. Single Professionals, Nerds and geeks

5. North Shore Womens Group

6. North Shore Separated & Divorced Group 

Laurie's 909 Steakhouse and Raw Bar is Wakefield's newest Restaurant and Bar with live entertainment several nights per week and Tuesday Night Trivia with Morgan White Jr. from WBZ Radio. Laurie's is located at the Wakefield Commuter Rail Train Station in Wakefield. The Reading and Haverhill Commuter Rail trains stop at Laurie's 909. Laurie's is easily accessible within 10 minutes from Routes 128, 93, 28 and 1. Free parking is available in two lots on Tuttle Street and on street. Check out the MBTA or Hop Stop for additional public transit options including the less reliable/infrequent 136 and 137 bus lines.

Check out the "Penny Lane" Bar, the 9:09 and Beatles references.

More information at http://www.lauries909.com.

See you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Call Laurie's to pick and reserve your seat at one of 2 bars or at a table.
item.name: Super Bowl Party at Laurie's 909 in Wakefield Includes Seating, Food & More
